description:
A browser for the LBRY network, a digital marketplace controlled by its users.

The LBRY Desktop app allows you to view content, upload your digital media accessible for free or at a set price, tip your favorite creators, send/receive LBRY Credits (LBC) and earn Credits through LBRY Rewards.
The app and web version run on top of the LBRY protocol which is a peer to peer (P2P), decentralized file sharing and payment network secured by blockchain technology.
Changed
- Updated lbrynet to 0.113.0
